meanings.definition: A place of residence; a house or home.
meanings.sent1: Many families have cozy abodes in the countryside.
meanings.sent2: The city is filled with various abodes, from apartments to townhouses.
meanings.sent3: The tiny mouse made its abode in the old shoe, much to the surprise of the owner.
meanings.sent4: Her heart found its abode in the quaint little cottage by the lake.
meanings.sent5: The abandoned abode stood silent and empty, a ghostly reminder of past lives.

meanings.sent1: The abodes of the villagers were scattered across the valley.
meanings.sent2: His nomadic lifestyle meant he had many temporary abodes over the years.
meanings.sent3: The abode of the mischievous raccoon was the attic of the old barn.
meanings.sent4: In the bustling city, the park became a peaceful abode for those seeking solace.
meanings.sent5: The cozy abode of the bear was a cave hidden deep in the forest.
